config.trident.debug.description: Options dedicated for the development of Trident.
config.trident.debug.enable_logging.name: Enable logging
config.trident.debug.enable_logging.desc: Intended for developers. Displays a bunch of useful information in chat
config.trident.global.name: Global Settings
config.trident.global.description: Universal non-game specific settings that apply across MCC Island.
config.trident.global.rarity_overlay.des: Displays an outline around the item in its slot, matching the item's rarity color.
config.trident.global.theme.name: Module theme
config.trident.global.theme.description: Changes the current theme that Modules are using.
config.trident.fishing.name: Fishing Modules
config.trident.fishing.description: Modules that apply to the Fishing game
config.trident.fishing.supplies_module.d: Shows a window that displays your current Bait, Line durability, your equipped Augments and your active Overclocks.
config.trident.fishing.flash_if_depleted: Makes Minecraft's taskbar/dock icon flash when your current spot depletes.
Shows a window that displays your progress towards a Grotto in your current climate.
config.trident.games.name: All Games
config.trident.games.description: Settings that apply to all games on MCC Island, except fishing
config.trident.games.auto_focus.name: Focus game on countdown
config.trident.games.auto_focus.descript: Automatically focuses Minecraft when your game is about to start.
config.trident.killfeed.name: Kill Feed
config.trident.killfeed.description: Options that apply to the in-game Kill Feed
config.trident.killfeed.enabled.name: Enable
config.trident.killfeed.hide_kills.name: Hide kill messages in chat
config.trident.killfeed.hide_kills.descr: When enabled, hides kill messages in the chat.
trident.not_island: You are not currently playing on MCC Island
